segments.text: Kim , have you made contact with Mr . Lee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet , Mr . Wang . But I'm working on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just keep getting a busy signal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe his phone is out of order . Anyway , keep working on it . I really need an answer about the contract I sent him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , I'll let you know when I get through .
segments.speaker: S2
